english.segment1: I was no one when i first met you. I had nothing of worth in my life. But then i found you and it all became clear. You're the one that i've been searching for
english.segment2: From the start i couldnt figure it out. Why someone like you would die for me. But i know that your love for me is so great. And that is why im giving you my life
english.segment3: I am yours every part of me. Jesus you're the reason i live. Take my life lord and use me as you will. Jesus you're the reason i live
english.segment4: I can't believe that you're with me til forever. I'll never leave you and you'll never leave me. It's what i long for your presence here in my life. Cos you're the air i breathe my reason why
